why_choose: Why choose this course? Strong reputation and accreditation Experienced faculty with industry expertise Excellent industry connections Modern and well-equipped training facilities Diverse student body for rich learning experience Practical training for real-world readiness
what_learn: What you will learn? A comprehensive education in the field of hospitality and hotel administration. An understanding of the intricacies of the successful operation of hotels and related establishments. Students learn to prioritize guest experience and develop a deep sense in interpersonal skills, communication, and problem-solving abilities. The program also imparts knowledge about various departments in a hotel, from front office to housekeeping, and food and beverage to event management. Three summer internships included in the course helps the students to have a better insight into the functioning of the industry . A well-rounded education that combines service excellence, organizational skills, and personal development.
